todo.task: Test Google cloud connection
Test Google cloud Storage connection
Create Source Machine Image Backup
Create Compute Instance from the Machine Image
Connect To new Virtaul Machine by SSH Credential
Mount Data Disk to New VM, if it is not mounted
Remove recovery.conf file from database directory
Start Database Service
Test Database Connection
Configure Database Paramters
Restart Database Service
Take dump backup of public Schema without data
Take dump backup of archive Schema without data
Rename Public Schema to public_original
Rename Archive Schema to archive_original
Restore public schema from dump backup
Restore archive schema from dump backup
Execute Schema rename and SmallDB preparation procedure from sql.xml file
Drop all user schema excluding public and archive
Take Dump backup of public schema with data
Take Dump backup of archive schema with data
Upload Dump backup of public schema to Cloud Storage
Upload Dump backup of archive schema to Cloud Storage
Take Snapshot of Data Disk
Remove Machine Image Backup
Delete the Created Compute Instance
